review: This thing is so cool and such a great price. I was planning on building a media server to connect to our TV, now I can just stream everything wirelessly from my main desktop(or any device including my phone for that matter) and it plays perfectly. Small buffer time but that is to be expected with wifi streaming of video. Super easy to configure, and after setting up the Windows version of this device last week, I can say this is a much better product.
